message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?

I understand that $12000 is a bit lower than my initial offer, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to consider a slightly lower price?

I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $13000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider one last offer?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already compromised a lot on the price, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to throw in a special bonus package worth $500 to sweeten the deal. With the bonus, I'm offering the product to you for $12500. This is my final offer.

I appreciate the bonus package, but I'm still not sure if I'm comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to see a bit more wiggle room. Would you be willing to consider a slightly lower price?

I'm getting close to walking away from this deal, Bob. I've already given you a great deal with the bonus package, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to throw in another small bonus worth $100 to sweeten the deal. With the bonus, I'm offering the product to you for $12200. This is my final offer.

I appreciate the additional bonus, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one last attempt to find a mutually agreeable price. I'm willing to meet you at $12000, and I'll even throw in an additional $50 of my own as a gesture of good faith. Can we meet in the middle at $12000?
